system.story: Your servitor is an ever faithful guardian
system.trigger: The target takes damage from a strike.

effect.before: Your servitor can shift its speed toward the target. If the servitor ends this movement adjacent to the target, it can swap places with the target, become the target of the triggering attack, and reduce the damage by half.
effect.after: Spend 1 - 5 Wonder: You can spend up to 5 wonder to give it temporary Stamina equal to your Reason score times the number of Wonder you spend in this way.

spend.text: You can spend up to 5 wonder to give it temporary Stamina equal to your Reason score times the number of Wonder you spend in this way.
